messagebundle.msg: This address cannot be found due to legal or contractual reasons.
The API key is either invalid or does not match the domain for which it was given.
The geocoding quota has been exceeded.
This address could not be processed due to a fault.
Type an address, then press Enter
Use one of the following map adjustment methods so that the crosshairs in the centre of the map represent your location:
Use the up/down/left/right control buttons in the top left corner of the map (these won't appear on small maps)
Click on the map, and drag it with the mouse button pressed
Use the up/down/left/right arrow keys on your keyboard

The red line shows the direction to the Qibla. You can visualise the direction better by choosing 'Satellite' from the list in the top right corner of the map. Use one of the following methods to zoom in for a closer look:
Use the +/- control buttons on the left hand side of the map
Use the wheel button of your mouse
